item.title: Ice barrage

item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

you would also need a void to control how long they’re held by the spell, mine says this for the spell itself

castOnPlayer.uberentangle();

public void uberentangle() { EntangleDelay = 70; }

item.title: Ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

so guys my ice barrage is gliched when u pking if u use it it send tele request like a teleother…

i find this on my ice barrage (o client)

[code]if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)

			if(playerLevel[6] >= 90) 
			{
                            
			sendMessage("You send tele requests");
			magebankgroup(377, 1);

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if(playerLevel[6] < 90) {
sendMessage(“You need a higher mage lvl”);
}

[/code][code]
if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) {
stillgfx(360, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(360, absY, absX);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
addSkillXP((2003*hitDiff), playerMagic);
setAnimation(50);
server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 200;
} else {
sendMessage(“You do not have 94 magic to cast this spell.”);
}
}

[/code] if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(50); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; //stillgfx(360, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

please can any 1 help ?
